Specified by:
updateData in interface javax.media.j3d.GeometryUpdater

updateDepthCoords

public void updateDepthCoords(SensorData kd)
Use new depth buffer data to update the PointsArray inside the Java 3D scene. This method is repeatedly called by DepthReader as the depth buffer changes. This method will not return until the 3D scene has been updated.
